Package voltage.core

Class VoltageSystem

java.lang.Object
voltage.core.VoltageSystem
public class VoltageSystem
extends java.lang.Object
Some global utility functions.

    • VoltageSystem

  • Method Details

    • InitializeApplication

      public static void InitializeApplication()
      Initializes the application - Do not call.

    • PrepareProcessor

      public static void PrepareProcessor()
      Prepares the processor - Do not call

    • GetApplicationPath

      public static java.lang.String GetApplicationPath()
      Gets the application's path. If this is a plugin mode, it will be the path to the host executable.
      Returns:
      the application's path.

    • GetLibraryPath

      public static java.lang.String GetLibraryPath()
      Gets the path to the library where all the modules, presets and logs are stored. On the Mac it'll be something like "/Library/Application Support/Voltage", on Windows, it could be something like "\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Voltage".
      Returns:
      the library path.

    • GetDocumentsPath

      public static java.lang.String GetDocumentsPath()
      The user's default documents folder. On Windows, this might be the user's "My Documents" folder. On the Mac it'll be their "Documents" folder.
      Returns:
      the user's documents path.

    • GetRecordingPath

      public static java.lang.String GetRecordingPath()
      This is where recordings are stored. It defaults to GetDocumentsPath()\Voltage Modular
      Returns:
      the user's recording path.

    • OutputDebug

      public static void OutputDebug​(java.lang.String logStatement)
      A debugging tool to log strings into the output window in a debugger.
      Parameters:
      logStatement - the string to log.

    • Log

      @Deprecated public static void Log​(java.lang.String logStatement)
      Deprecated.
      Use VoltageModule.Log() instead. @see VoltageModule

    • LogError

      @Deprecated public static void LogError​(java.lang.String logStatement)
      Deprecated.

    • ShowDropDownMenu

      @Deprecated public static int ShowDropDownMenu​(java.lang.String[] options, int currentlySelectedIndex, VoltageComponent showMenuUnderThisObject)
      Deprecated.
      Use VoltageModule.ShowDropDownMenu() instead. @see VoltageModule
